Hi,
I am using WPF Ribbon control (3.5) and I want to localize it. I tried to bind the textual properties ( LabelTitle, TooltipTitle, TooltipDescription.) but this can not be done.
So I tried to access these properties in code-behind, but it seems that only the change of "LabelTitle" property works ok. Changing the other 2 properties (TooltipTitle and TooltipDescription) has no effect on the Ribbon control.

Am I missing some refresh methods that should be performed after changing these properties ??

Yoav.
